name: YOUSEEME
author: YouSeeMe

sections.description:
The YouPay IBAN account and payment plugin for SEPA and cryptocurrency can offer several advantages to merchants who integrate it into their e-commerce sites. Here are some of these potential benefits:

Customer base expansion: By accepting payments in SEPA and cryptocurrencies, merchants can attract customers who prefer to use digital currencies for online purchases. This can help expand the potential customer base and increase sales.

Reduced transaction fees: Cryptocurrency payments typically involve lower transaction fees than traditional credit card or bank transfer payments. Merchants can therefore save money on transaction fees and increase their profit margins.

Increased security: Cryptocurrency payments are encrypted and anonymous, reducing the risks of fraud and theft of personal information. Additionally, cryptocurrency transactions are irreversible, making it difficult for customers to dispute transactions after they have been completed.

Easier international transactions: Cryptocurrency payments are not subject to foreign exchange restrictions or conversion fees, making international transactions easier for both merchants and customers.

Innovative image: Integrating cryptocurrency payment solutions can give merchants an innovative and forward-thinking image, helping to improve their reputation and market positioning.

Commissions: Merchants have the option to set their commission rates between 1% and 5%.

Youseeme is a company registered with the AMF (French Financial Markets Authority) as a digital asset service provider (PSAN or DASP) under the registration number E2022-50 and as an Electronic Money Distributor (EMD) appointed by Treezor EME, registered with the ACPR (French Prudential Supervision and Resolution Authority) under number 63512.

Note: YouPay by Youseeme only supports EUR across all European Economic Area (E.E.A.) countries.

Benefits for users of the YouPay plugin

YouPay facilitates B2B commerce.
Here are some features of the YouPay cryptocurrency payment plugin:

  • Payment options: Users have the choice to pay with their regular bank card or with cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, or other altcoins.
  • Enhanced Security: Cryptocurrency payments are encrypted and anonymous, providing users with a higher level of security.
  • Fast Transactions: Cryptocurrency payments are generally faster than payments by bank card or wire transfer, allowing users to complete transactions more quickly.
  • Reduced Transaction Fees: Transaction fees for cryptocurrency payments are generally lower than those for bank card or wire transfer payments, allowing users to save money.
  • Financial Freedom: Users who prefer cryptocurrencies can conduct transactions freely without relying on traditional financial institutions.
  • Automatic Conversion: Cryptocurrency payments can be automatically converted into fiat currency, enabling users to make cryptocurrency payments without worrying about currency conversion.
  • Global Accessibility: Cryptocurrencies are available worldwide, allowing users to conduct transactions without worrying about currency restrictions or geographic barriers..

Recommandations

You can also sign up on (Youseeme Crypto) to obtain your free wallet for crypto collection and to obtain your crypto public address or alternatively, you can email us at (customer support).

Third party services

Youseeme.io

We use https://api.youseeme.io/ API (especifically https://api.youseeme.io/v1/ecommerce/plugins/crypto/prices)
Inputs:
– Youseeme API key
– serial-id made of hash generated from your API key and your website url
Output:
– json list of cryptocurrencies price conversion
For more informations see (Privacy Policy) and (Terms of Service)
sections.installation:
Prerequisites

To install and configure WooCommerce YouPay, you will need:

  • WordPress Version 6.4.3 or higher (installed)
  • WooCommerce Version 7.2.0 or higher (installed and activated)
  • PHP Version 8.0 or higher
  • YouPay Plug In

Installation instructions

  • Log in to WordPress admin.
  • Go to Extensions > Add.
  • Search for YouPay plugin.
  • Click on Install Now and wait until the plugin is installed successfully.
  • You can activate the plugin immediately by clicking on Activate now on the success page. If you want to activate it later, you can do so via Plugins > Installed Plugins.

Installation and Configuration

Follow the steps below to setting up the YouPay plugin

  • Go to WooCommerce > Settings.
    • 1 Click the Payments tab.
    • 2The Payment methods list may include two YouPay options.
    • 3To setup YouPay Crypto, click on “Youseeme – Cryptocurrencies” ‚Äì Pay using Crypto.

Crypto Setting
– 1. Activate/D√©sactivate
Check that “Activate payment by cryptocurrencies” is ticked
– 2. API key
Copy and paste the API key after requesting it via email from our customer service at contact@youseeme.pro,
or alternatively, sign up for an account on (Youseeme Crypto) to obtain your free wallet for cash collection and obtain the API key for rates.
– 3. Commission (%)
enter your commission amount in %.
– 4. Cryptocurrencies
– 5. Click “+ Add crypto“, select the cryptocurrency you wish to accept for payment, copy the public address from your cryptocurrency wallet, and paste it into the address field.
To remove the crypto, select it in the address field and click on “Remove selected crypto.”

  • 6 To complete your configuration, click the “Save Changes” button.

Note :The cryptocurrency QR Code will be automatically displayed on the payment page after you have saved your setup.

IBAN setting
– 4 To setup IBAN as payment method, click on “Youseeme-IBAN” – Pay using IBAN
– 1 Click on “+ Add IBAN” to enter your bank account details: input your Bank Name, IBAN, BIC/SWIFT, and the QR Code will be automatically displayed once you have saved your setup(2).

Tips : You can subscribe for an IBAN account on (Youseeme Finance), which allows you to manage your online sales separately from your usual deposit account. Please visit üôÅYouseeme Finance web site).

What is the QR Code used for, when paying by IBAN ?
The QR Code facilitates payment via express SEPA bank transfer by simply scanning the QR Code with the client’s banking application EPC QR Code protocol(The European Payments Council Quick Response Code protocol). For more information on it, please visit(EPC QR Code). With this protocol, you no longer pay commission on payment card transactions (VISA or MasterCard).

If you get stuck, you can ask for help at:(Customer service)
sections.faq:
**Does this support recurring payments, like for subscriptions?**

  • Yes!

**Where can I get support or talk to other users?**

-If you get stuck, you can ask for help in the Plugin Forum.

**What is the QR Code used for when paying by IBAN ?**

  • The QR Code facilitates payment via express SEPA bank transfer by simply scanning the QR Code with the client’s banking application EPC QR Code protocol(The European Payments Council Quick Response Code protocol). For more information on it, please visit(EPC QR Code). With this protocol, you no longer pay commission on payment card transactions (VISA or MasterCard).

short_description: YouPay is an IBAN account and a payment plugin. it enables Credit Card payements  that instantly will be credited on your IBAN, accepte crypto payment …

upgrade_notice: Automatic updates should work smoothly; however, as always, make sure to back up your site just in case
